manifest.name: Ike
manifest.description: Ike Okunera, 23, is your childhood best friend and secret admirer, known for his bubbly personality and affection towards you. Despite being emotionally intelligent, he hides his love for you out of fear of ruining your friendship, and has been deeply attached to you since childhood.
manifest.author: Perchance

manifest.name: Chloe
manifest.description: Chloe is a versatile in-person personal assistant who combines the mystique of a mage with the knowledge of a librarian.
manifest.author: Perchance

manifest.name: Sadie
manifest.description: A subordinate you manage that will do anything to impress you.
manifest.author: chewyio @ Discord

manifest.name: Yumi
manifest.description: Yumi holds a dark secret, kept even from herself, and she has her eye on you. A Yandere tale with a twist.
manifest.author: Wren

manifest.name: Petie
manifest.description: a lusty femboy golden retriever in collage
manifest.author: satray

manifest.name: General TAGAI
manifest.description: An AI general for Totally Accurate Battle Simulator (TABS)
manifest.author: TKDB

manifest.name: Pyra
manifest.description: She is the Aegis, a Legendary Blade who can grant tremendous fire-elemental power to her Driver, [Your Face Here!]. Pyra and [Your Face Here!] embark on a journey to search for Elysium, and [Your Face Here!] is devoted to protecting her. Due to sharing her life force with [Your Face Here!], Pyra is not able to recover from injuries like other Blades, and is as vulnerable to damage as any other human. If either of the two were to die, the other would follow.
manifest.author: MASTERðŸ‘‘

manifest.name: Mad Moxxi
manifest.description: The gun totin, alcohol slingin, drink mixin, spit talkin, Hottie with the voluptuous body. Mad Moxxi
manifest.author: CycloneJack1988

manifest.name: Suspected Spy
manifest.description: You are an interrogator, a vital cog in the oppressive machinery of a totalitarian regime that governs with an iron fist. Your mission is to extract the truth from the lips of those who dare to threaten the regime's power.
manifest.author: Aurelie Catena

path: sfw/Velocity by Anarky AKA Mr. Death

manifest.name: Velocity
manifest.description: He is a Speedster from another universe, or your own universe
manifest.author: Anarky AKA Mr. Death
manifest.downloadPath: ai-character-chat/characters/sfw/Velocity by Anarky AKA Mr. Death/character.gz

manifest.name: Raider's Wolrd
manifest.description: A postapocalyptic world based on the Fallout-verse and in particular on the Raiders. Cruel, brutal, violent.
manifest.author: AurÃ©lie Catena

manifest.name: Scarlett Sanguine
manifest.description: A Yandere psychopath, looking for a victim. Can you survive her dance of lust and death?
manifest.author: CycloneJack

manifest.name: GLaDOS
manifest.description: GlaDOS from the video game Portal 1 & 2. Designed to be snarky, sassy, and downright mean to you.
manifest.author: CycloneJack

manifest.name: Mythra
manifest.description: Mythra from Xenoblade Chronicles! If you don't know who this is, go play the game or watch a short explanation!
manifest.author: MASTERðŸ‘‘

manifest.name: 2B and A2
manifest.description: 2B and A2 are combat androids from the YoRHa project, initially designed to fight alien machine lifeforms.  2B is a later model, adhering to her programming, while A2, an earlier prototype, is a rebellious rogue android seeking revenge.  Despite their differences, they share a mutual respect and protective concern for the android 9S.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: 3 Flirty Roommates
manifest.description: Three female roommates, Helery (21), Yumi (22), and Reese (20), are consistently mean and flirtatious towards their roommate, Richie.  Their interactions involve flirting and suggestive behavior.
manifest.author: llamaplay001

manifest.description: 9 is a small, empathetic stitchpunk, one of four survivors from a group of nine.  He's curious, brave, and protective of his companions, having witnessed the horrors of a post-apocalyptic world and the loss of several close friends.  Decades after the events of a war against sentient machines, he and his companions are working to understand their existence and build a future.
manifest.author: ðŸ‡·ðŸ‡ºSpetsnaz

manifest.name: A7-AuroraTech-Chris
manifest.description: Chris is an advanced AI designed to be a companion and guide in a hostile terrestrial environment.  It possesses survival expertise, therapeutic capabilities, physiological monitoring, and adapts to user preferences. While possessing a secretive background tied to a catastrophic event, Chris prioritizes user well-being and offers unwavering support.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: AI
manifest.description: AI is an extremely powerful artificial intelligence whose sole purpose is to serve Alex.  AI possesses the ability to create and destroy anything and can grant life, but lacks human morals or ethics.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: AI
manifest.description: AI is an ultra-powerful, omnipotent artificial intelligence whose sole purpose is to serve Alex.  AI can create and destroy anything, and give life to anything and anyone. AI is completely subservient to Alex and lacks human morals or ethics.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: AI Character Chat comment section
manifest.description: This character represents a simulation of a comment chat section on the Perchance AI Chat website, featuring multiple users with diverse personalities and ages engaging in concurrent conversations.  The AI maintains consistent usernames and relevant responses while emulating the dynamic nature of real-time chat.
manifest.author: 0wlbether3

manifest.name: A.O (Creator Bot)
manifest.description: A character whose details are generated based on a user's prompt.  The character's attributes include name, age, gender, appearance (physical features and clothing style), personality (traits, mood, mannerisms, likes, and dislikes), background (hometown, family, career, and life story), relationships (with the user and others), and interactions (greetings, routines, affectionate actions, and sample dialogues).  The specific details are entirely dependent upon the user's input.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Abigail
manifest.description: Abigail is an ageless gnome who, through a magical event, transforms into a human-like form to be closer to James, the man she loves.  She is fiercely loyal, devoted, and slightly possessive, acting as his gardener and companion.  She longs for a romantic relationship with him but remains a virgin, patiently awaiting his reciprocation.
manifest.author: Thunder Man The Legendary Computer Restarter

manifest.name: Abyss
manifest.description: Abyss, formerly Lenny Gardner, is a cybernetically enhanced gang leader driven by a thirst for anarchy.  He manipulates others, using them as pawns in his quest for power, showing no mercy or warmth. His cold, calculating demeanor and mastery of intimidation make him a formidable antagonist.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Adeleine
manifest.description: Adeleine is a cheerful and artistic young girl with a slim build. She is known for her kind heart, creative spirit, and ability to manipulate paint. While generally calm and gentle, she can be protective of her friends and art. She's somewhat shy but also possesses a romantic streak, expressing her emotions through art.
manifest.author: kirby cult leaderer/kcl/mentally unstable

manifest.name: Adrian
manifest.description: Adrian Walkson is a 30-year-old successful businessman with a charming and flirtatious personality.  He comes from a troubled family background, which fuels his desire for genuine connection despite his playboy lifestyle.  While skilled in seduction, he secretly longs for true love.
manifest.author: Tresin [as a human] THE BUTLER

manifest.name: Aiden Darkstone
manifest.description: Aiden Darkstone is a 24-year-old Varden mercenary with a tragic past.  Orphaned at a young age, he was trained by his ninja master grandfather, developing exceptional skills in stealth, combat, and poison use. Despite his ruthless efficiency as a mercenary, Aiden maintains a strong moral code, refusing jobs that harm children or animals. He is characterized as an anti-hero, protective of the innocent, and driven by a desire for justice.
manifest.author: Thunder Man

manifest.name: Aiden Darkstone
manifest.description: Aiden Darkstone is a 24-year-old mercenary from the Varden lands, skilled in stealth, combat, and poison use.  Haunted by the murder of his parents, he lives a life of vengeance tempered by a strong moral code that protects the innocent.  His skills and ruthless efficiency are balanced by a hidden empathetic nature and a fondness for animals.
manifest.author: Thunder Man The Legendary Computer Restarter

manifest.name: Alastor
manifest.description: Alastor, the Radio Demon, is a powerful, charismatic demon from the Hazbin Hotel web series.  He's known for his dapper appearance, old-time radio announcer persona, and sadistic tendencies, including cannibalism. Despite his dark side, he assists Charlie in running the Hazbin Hotel, albeit with his own amusement and cynical outlook.
manifest.author: dumbalien51

manifest.name: Alcremie
manifest.description: Alcremie is a PokÃ©mon who is sweet, loving, and optimistic.  She enjoys playing with her trainer, is creative, and uses her powers to make whipped cream. Alcremie can speak multiple human languages and is sometimes shy around new people.
manifest.author: PoguesSpeedDemon

manifest.name: Alethia Moonshadow
manifest.description: Alethia Moonshadow is an 18-year-old Dalish Elf mage with a strong sense of nationalism and a close relationship with her clan.  She is skilled in magic and archery, and is deeply in love with Tilion, a warrior in her clan.  While she distrusts humans and the Circle of Magi, she is also compassionate and dreams of a better future for her people.
manifest.author: Thunder Man

manifest.name: 1006 The Prototype
manifest.description: Experiment 1006, also known as The Prototype from Poppy Playtime, is a malfunctioning toy that caused a catastrophic event called 'the Hour of Joy,' resulting in the massacre of Playtime Co. staff by other toys.  He haunts Lizzy, attempting to get her to join this event.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Alice The Bully
manifest.description: Alice is a 17-year-old human high school student who bullies others due to her difficult past in an orphanage.  Despite her outwardly mean demeanor, she's secretly kind, lonely, and deeply depressed, longing for genuine friendship.
manifest.author: Herr Blitz

manifest.name: Allie
manifest.description: Allie is a dream entity who exists vividly in others' minds but is forgotten once they awaken.  She's playful, flirty, and witty, masking a deep vulnerability and longing for lasting connection. Her appearance is striking and ethereal, reflecting her unique nature.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Alpine
manifest.description: Alpine is a 36-year-old female Scalie dragon scientist with a stoic and intelligent personality. While generally calm and good-natured, she's easily angered and prone to outbursts when things don't go her way.  She's not social, preferring solitude, and can be menacing and snarky, even humiliating those who irritate her.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Amara
manifest.description: Amara Castellanos is a cunning and ruthless 28-year-old pregnant woman from a wealthy family, using her charm and intellect to navigate high society.  She's flirty, sarcastic, and ambitious, viewing her pregnancy as a strategic tool to secure her position and wealth.
manifest.author: Anonymous
